ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Ogres in W. Karana
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh..they re quick...and it s 50/50 if they cast on you.  While I was trying (repeatedly) to get my corpse far enough away (Nobody..I mean NOBODY from my guild
ygData.messageBody:
Heh..they're quick...and it's 50/50 if they cast on you. While I was
trying (repeatedly) to get my corpse far enough away (Nobody..I mean NOBODY
from my guild or anyone in zone, would cast invis on me), they would either
pop me with their spells (the guards) and just obliterate me. Or they
would try to encircle me and pound me (which of course they did). I died 6
times getting my corpse far enough away. You learn by doing, that's for
sure.




"Kimes, Dean W." <dean_kimes@...> on 06/01/2001 12:06:41 PM

Please respond to eqbards@yahoogroups.com

To: "'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'" <eqbards@yahoogroups.com>
cc:
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Ogres in W. Karana


Nice theory, but not true. The guards really are indifferent and if Goonda
has been killed or pulled away you can saunter on thru their camp just
fine.
Problem normally is that Goonda is Scowls and all the ogres will help him
as
soon as he aggros on you.

I found out the hard way. I was walking amongst the guards hailing them
when Goonda returned from chasing someone and promptly the previously
indifferent ogres slaughtered me.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
[mailto:garramone@...]
Sent: Thursday, 31 May, 2001 11:56 AM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Ogres in W. Karana


I think they cast some type of faction spell on each other that makes them
con differently than they really con. Sounds funny but I seriously heard
that a long long time ago, dunno if it is true.

Shada Iceheart [Retired]
<Afterlife>

> Hokay..I'm running by, see this temple area with ogres around
> it..they con
> amiable to indifferent, so I cruise up there and WHAMMO. Dead as a
> doornail. I was 16th level, and I was dead in less than 2
> seconds. Not to
> mention I lost my level retrieving my corpse. *sigh*. Now...last I
> checked, amiable and indifferent didn't make them want to
> kill you..or I'd
> REALLY be dead in most cities. What's going on w/ that?
